name: Spine
blurb: Spine is a 2D skeletal animation tool designed specifically for game development. Bring your games to life quickly and easily!

rewards.reward: BACKER - You will receive our sincere thanks for helping us to improve Spine! Your name will appear in the credits inside the app and you get a special badge on our official forum.
SUPPORTER - You will receive ONE license for the full version of Spine when the Kickstarter is over (normally $55). Plus everything a BACKER gets.

FEATURED - You will receive ONE license for the full version of Spine when the Kickstarter is over (normally $55). You will also get a screenshot and link to your website on our esotericsoftware.com featured games page when you release a full game using Spine. This applies to all subsequent pledges. Plus everything a BACKER gets.
INDIE STARTER - You will receive TWO licenses for the full version of Spine when the Kickstarter is over (normally $110). Plus everything a BACKER gets.

ARTIST WORKSHOP VIDEO - You will receive TWO licenses for the full version of Spine when the Kickstarter is over (normally $110) and a digital recording of the Artist Workshop event. You won't be able to ask questions, but you can review all the information. Plus everything a BACKER gets.

CODING WORKSHOP VIDEO - You will receive TWO licenses for the full version of Spine when the Kickstarter is over (normally $110) and a digital recording of the Coding Workshop event. You won't be able to ask questions, but you can review all the information. Plus everything a BACKER gets.

BOTH WORKSHOP VIDEOS - You will receive TWO licenses for the full version of Spine when the Kickstarter is over (normally $110) and a digital recording of both the Artist and Coding Workshop events. You won't be able to ask questions, but you can review all the information. Plus everything a BACKER gets.

ARTIST WORKSHOP - You will receive TWO licenses for the full version of Spine when the Kickstarter is over (normally $110) and you are invited to the Spine Artist Workshop event. This will be a Google Hangout where professional artist S\u00f8ren Nielsen will show tips and techniques for creating art assets to use with Spine and how to best use Spine to create great animations. The event will take place on March 2nd at 12:00pm PST. It will last a few hours, you may ask questions, and you will receive a recording of the event. Plus everything a BACKER gets.

CODING WORKSHOP - You will receive TWO licenses for the full version of Spine when the Kickstarter is over (normally $90) and you are invited to the Spine Coding Workshop event. This will be a Google Hangout where professional programmer Nathan Sweet will show how to use Spine with the supported game toolkits, tips and techniques for structuring your game, how to do procedural animation at runtime, and more. The event will take place on March 9th at 12:00pm PST. It will last a few hours, you may ask questions, and you will receive a recording of the event. Plus everything a BACKER gets.

BOTH WORKSHOPS - You will receive TWO licenses for the full version of Spine when the Kickstarter is over (normally $110) and you are invited to both the Artist and Coding Workshop events. They will last a few hours, you may ask questions, and you will receive a recording of both the events. Plus everything a BACKER gets.

GAME TOOLKIT RUNTIME - You will receive FOUR licenses for the full version of Spine and we will implement a Spine runtime for the game library of your choice. You will also be invited to both the Artist and Coding Workshop events and you will receive a recording of both the events. Plus everything  a BACKER gets.
